product_name: First Aid BeautyFirming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide + Collagen
summary: SummaryFirst Aid Beauty's Ultra Repair Firming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide + Collagen hydrates to help visibly firm skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with Peptides and NiacinamideThis moisturizer helps sculpt and smooth skin making it look bouncy, healthy and youthful with fewer visible fine lines and wrinkles and a soft, supple textureNon-comedogenicKey IngredientsPeptides: Helps smooth skin and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Niacinamide: Helps skin appear more bouncy and restore healthy tone and texture.Research ResultsIn a consumer perception study with 30 participants after 4 weeks:90% reported this product helped smooth fine lines and wrinkles and kept skin looking youthful.Item 2632108Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Yes, this is the third jar of this great face cream.
reviews.comments: I live this face cream, it's my 3rd jar!! Love the thickness and the glow it gives my skin.

reviews.headline: Enjoy this Product, buying for a second time
reviews.comments: I am happy I came across this product. Ive been looking for a face moisturizer that has beneficial, antiaging ingredients. I just turned 30 so I want to invest in great skin care products and this moisturizer so far has been a great addition to my skin care routine. It moisturizes my face without leaving greasy or sticky residue, it sits well under makeup, and did not break out my acne prone skin. My face has been feeling so soft. I will continue to buy as long as it works :)

reviews.headline: Lovely Hydration
reviews.comments: I like the amount of hydration I can get from this cream. Unfortunately it doesn't seem to ever fully absorb for me no matter the routine I use it in, or the amount that I use. After weeks of use I did start to breakout, so I have moved it to my hydration routine only nights.

reviews.headline: Good stuff!
reviews.comments:
I use several FAB products. I recently started using this one bc I wanted some firming attributes, but wanted the hydration. Definitely hydrating, and I think I'm feeling some firming. 
So far so good. I'll definitely buy this again.

reviews.headline: My skin looooooves this!!!
reviews.comments: My skin eats this up. I have really sensitive skin, and First Aid Beauty products are primarily what I use. I love having a cream that can really calm it down and deeply hydrate it. I cant get enough of this! This was gifted in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Simple and Effective-- New Favorite!
reviews.comments: First Aid Beauty is a consistent favorite of mine, and this cream is no different! I like that it hydrates my sensitive skin with no issues-- no clogged pores or dry skin here. I love how no-nonsense this brand is. I can always trust them to use simple, effective ingredients that make my skin happy.

reviews.headline: My go to moisturizer
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. I've gone through so many jars, and I will keep coming back. I love the whipped consistency, but it doesn't feel heavy on the skin at all. I have pretty sensitive skin and it's never cause me to break out or get irritated. It makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated. I will come back again and again and again. It's just that good!

reviews.headline: Emptied before!
reviews.comments: This is such a lovely cream! In fact, I love it so much I have purchased and emptied two jars before. It has a nice creamy texture, but nothing that's hard to rub in. It does a wonderful job at hydrating and firming my skin. It's a very reliable formula, and safe to use for everyday!

reviews.headline: Two ingredients cause for irritation and clogged pores!
reviews.comments: Beware! Adverse reactions if you have sensitive, acne, combo or rosacea type skin. Palmitic acid and stearic acid together are known to cause inflammation and can clog pores as per the EWG website and other ingredient checker sites. Pass on this!

reviews.headline: Wrinkles be gone
reviews.comments: I got the chance to try the Firming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide + Collagen from First Aid Beauty and I'm so glad I did because this has been my favorite moisturizer the last several weeks. This cream makes my skin feel hydrated and bouncy but has given me a snatched look. No sagging skin. My forehead lines look less pronounced. My crows feet near my eyes also less noticeable. My skin there looks more filled in and the lines don't look as deep. I love the ingredients in this cream. All the bangers - niacinamide, peptides, and collagen! My skin loves them all! Highly recommend this cream if you're looking for an effective cream to help skin look more youthful and hydrated at the same time!

reviews.headline: firming cream
reviews.comments: I recently got my hands on the First Aid Beauty Firming Cream with peptides, niacinamide and collagen and I love how gentle this is on my skin. My skin feels much tighter and firmer after just a few days of using!

reviews.headline: amazing cream!
reviews.comments: I have been using this cream to finish off my nighttime skin care routine and it has been amazing! its super moisturizing and i absolutely love the benefits of it.

reviews.headline: My favourite cream!
reviews.comments: Honestly my skin has improved drastically using just this one cream! Theres so many good ingredients packed in the little jar that it just has to work and it did! My skin texture and tone improved so much. It's firmer and healthier! Such a great product. FAB products just never disappoint! This has great anti ageing benefits and I am here for it!

reviews.headline: Amazing anti aging cream
reviews.comments:
I have sensitive dry skin and cream, enriched with peptides and collagen been working amazingly for me. I like that it has no scent and non-comedogenic.
Texture is soft abd absorbs without leaving the skin greasy. Most of the time l use it in my evenjng roitine.
In the morning my skin looks and feels plump and vety soft! Amazing anti aging cream!

reviews.headline: So hydrating!!
reviews.comments: I am so excited to find a new firming cream with peptides, niacinamide, and collagen in it to help my skin. I started applying this twice daily and can already see a huge improvement in my skin. The cream is so luxurious and leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and wonderful. I love that this has so many wonderful ingredients in to help my skin. My skin has been looking so much brighter and healthier. I love that it has a subtle hint to it and it is not overpowering at all.

reviews.headline: Loving it!
reviews.comments: I am loving this caollagen firming cream. It is moisturizing and leaves my face feeling smooth! I plan to continue using.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This cream has done wonders for my skin in this dry cold climate. It has visibly plumped and hydrated my skin while softening fine lines that I am self conscious about. I highly recommend this!

reviews.headline: A beauty that has a clean purpose
reviews.comments: Super clean and gentle ingredients that heals and repairs the skin as it hydrates and rejuvenates.  The texture is so smooth and silky yet so airy and penetrates to the skin beautifully.  Brings healhy look and a natural glow to the skin as it works to plump the skin and smoothes out the lines and wrinkles.  Quenches the thirsty skin with the besy quality olingredients blended in a magical formula.

reviews.headline: Hydrates and refreshes my dry skin
reviews.comments: The Firming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide, and Collagen has completely won me over! First, the milky texture is absolutely amazing it feels so smooth and luxurious on the skin. I'm especially impressed with how lightweight it is, making it a perfect addition to my daily routine. I applied it to both my face and neck, and it instantly helped combat dryness, leaving my skin feeling soft, smooth, and deeply hydrated. The refreshing and cooling sensation is a huge plus, adding an extra layer of comfort to my skincare experience. What I love most is that it absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, making it ideal for all skin types. This is my new skin care favorite plus its gentle for my skin.

reviews.headline: Winner!
reviews.comments: Love this product! I'm in my 40s and fair skinned— this cream has helped improve the texture and smoothness of my face. I definitely recommend it!

media.headline: Two ingredients cause for irritation and clogged pores!
media.caption: This is not a sensitive skin cream!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm absolutely in love with the First Aid Beauty Firming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide + Collagen! This product has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't say enough good things about it. From the first use, I could feel the difference in the texture of my skin—it became so much smoother and more plump. The cream itself is rich and luxurious without feeling heavy, and it absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling hydrated and nourished.
What really impressed me is how it's formulated with powerful ingredients like peptides, niacinamide, and collagen, which work together to visibly firm and rejuvenate my skin. I've noticed that my skin looks more toned and has a healthier, youthful glow since incorporating this cream into my routine. The niacinamide helps even out my skin tone, while the collagen boosts elasticity, making my skin feel firmer and more supple.
The scent is subtle and pleasant, which I really appreciate because I'm sensitive to strong fragrances. After using it consistently, I can honestly say my skin feels more resilient and revitalized. I also love that it's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and it doesn't cause any irritation or breakouts for me, which is a huge win.
The packaging is sleek and simple, and the jar has a nice, sturdy feel to it. A little goes a long way, so this jar lasts a decent amount of time, making it well worth the price. If you're looking for a cream that firms, hydrates, and rejuvenates with a blend of effective ingredients, I highly recommend giving this a try. It has made such a difference in my skin's appearance and texture, and I'm definitely repurchasing!
faceoff_positive.headline: wow

faceoff_negative.comments: This is my second time using this product. The first jar I adored. It was very moisturizing and worked well. I ordered it on November and had no reaction or problems at all. This time however I had a terrible reaction. I noticed a burning sensation. A couple of hours later, my cheeks were red, hot to touch, and had a horrible raised rash. It looked like my face was swollen and had fluid under my cheeks. I took medications that night for relief. The next morning I woke up with facial swelling and the fluid had moved into my eyes. I went to the doctor and had to get treated with a steroid injection and was placed on oral steroids for relief. It is as if the formula was changed which is very unfortunate.
faceoff_negative.headline: Terrible rash

rollup.name: Firming Cream with Peptides, Niacinamide + Collagen
